name: AsianFanfics - Dark (Fixed)
description: A fixed version of Weology's dark style for asianfanfics.com (see original here): AsianFanfics - Custom Layout (Dark).
additional_info:
Styled upvote and subscribe buttons on story pages
Small unsub/remove buttons on mobile devices for story listings
Fixed header size and mobile menu on mobile devices
Added word breaking for long text (for Firefox)
